quest_desc.qkname: The One Who Tries To Open The Door

talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

${user_nick}$
(Ask the Elf Elder if anyone has entered the Monolith.)

${user_nick}$
(The Elf Elder is in front of the Tree of Life.)

${user_nick}$
(The Elf Elder is in front of the Tree of Life.)

$Elf Elder$
What's the matter? You look like you ran here in a hurry.

${user_nick}$
(Tell him what Argenta said)

$Elf Elder$
We've been guarding this place day and night.
A few Dragon Followers tried to enter, but we stopped all of them.

${user_nick}$
But… Feder was inside.

$Elf Elder$
What? How can that be possible…?!
Why don't you ask our king about this?
Since his body is combined with the Tree of Life which stretches its roots under the Monolith, he may have seen more things than we did.

$Elf Elder$
We've been guarding this place day and night.
A few Dragon Followers tried to enter, but we stopped all of them.
(You must be Lv. 74 or above to proceed with this quest.)

${user_nick}$
Okay.
(Enter the Tree of Life.)

$Feder$
(You cannot talk with him.)

$Lunaria$
(You cannot talk with her.)

${user_nick}$
(Where's Federeth? Wait, isn't that Feder?! And next to him...)

${user_nick}$
(Listen to their conversation.)

$Feder${sound:npc_Feder_9426_qu_01.ogg}
Are you telling me the truth, Lunaria?

$Lunaria$
(She nods.)

$Feder${sound:npc_Feder_9426_qu_02.ogg}
If what you're saying is the truth, we can be considered to be on the same side... or maybe not. What is your real goal?

$Lunaria${sound:npc_Lunaria_9426_qu_01.ogg}
My goal?

$Feder${sound:npc_Feder_9426_qu_03.ogg}
Yes, your goal. Since you're a fragment of the Goddess, you wouldn't care about human's petty feelings.

$Lunaria${sound:npc_Lunaria_9426_qu_02.ogg}
...That's true if you think so. But I'm just doing what I need to do.

$Elf King Federeth$
{user_nick}? What brings you here?

${user_nick}$
?!?!!Yuvenciel! You weren't here a moment ago!

$Elf King Federeth$
It's Federeth now. I was here all along. You're the one who appeared out of a sudden. Is something wrong?

${user_nick}$
…?!?! What?
(What's going on here?)

$Elf King Federeth$
…You seem to be searching for answers that cannot be solved in our current world.
May I suggest a few words that might answer your queries?

${user_nick}$
…(Looks like time travel or talking about Feder and Lunaria would make no sense right now. Ask him about the intruders to the Monolith first)

$Elf King Federeth$
Hmm intruders…? I didn't see any intruders. At least there were no intruders who entered through the Anu Arendel entrance. But I do feel something weird abou the Abyss of Heat. Why don't you try checking that place out?

${user_nick}$
I see. I'll go and check on Abyss of Heat right now.

$Elf King Federeth$
You're busy trying to save the world as usual.(Federeth gives you a warm smile)
We will guard this place to our utmost abilities so you can concentrate on the issues on your hand.
(Go to the Abyss of Heat)

$Lunaria${sound:npc_Lunaria_9426_qu_03.ogg}
You're...
(Lunaria's eyes widen with suprise)

${user_nick}$
You're the girl who was talking to Feder just now...!!!!

$Lunaria${sound:npc_Lunaria_9426_qu_04.ogg}
…So this is how we meet each other this time…
Long time no see.

${user_nick}$
Long time no see....?? Do I know you?

$Lunaria$
You don't know me... but I know you.

${user_nick}$
(What is she saying?) Are you the person who broke into the Monolith?!!
Did you do something to do seal stone too?

$Lunaria$
…Well, first of all I'm not a person, and as for the seal stone… I just took a peek. There were too many "things" inside so I was a little suprised.
Only now that I see the things that I couldn't see the other time. Like him, I...

${user_nick}$
What are you talking about? You'd better give me some clear answers. What are you? What are you doing here? And what were you doing with Feder?

$Lunaria$
We both want the same thing. That's why I'm with him.

$Lunaria$
{user_nick}...?! What are you doing here?!!

${user_nick}$
Lunaria! Finally we meet again!
What were you talking to Feder about just now? Why are you with Feder?
You said to me yourself that the owner of the Red Army has to be stopped...

$Lunaria$
...

${user_nick}$
Come on Lunaria… answer me!
How come you're with Feder?!!

$Lunaria$
He wants to open the door and I have to open it too.
That's all.

${user_nick}$
What? You know what will happen if you open the Monolith!!
You won't solve anything by opening it. Think about what might happen to this world. Don't tell me you want to destroy this world too?!!

$Lunaria$
(Lunaria looks suprised.)

${user_nick}$
Answer me, Lunaria!!

$Lunaria$
No, I'm not trying to destroy everything… The only thing that will disappear will be…
(Lunaria looks at you with her eyes full of sadness)

${user_nick}$
Lunaria...?

$Lunaria$
I'm sorry. I can't... I just can't tell you anything right now...

${user_nick}$
You're trying to open the Monolith too? But why?

$Lunaria$
Because I need to.

${user_nick}$
You must have a reason.

$Lunaria${sound:npc_Lunaria_9426_qu_05.ogg}
I exist to open the Monolith. That's all.

${user_nick}$
Are you out of your mind? The whole world will be destroyed if you open the Monolith!

$Lunaria$
(Lunaria looks flustered.)

$Lunaria$
Everything will be destroyed when the Monolith is opened? No that's not true… It can't be true.
There was only one thing that disappeared when I opened the Monolith… Only him... It has always been that way. But not anymore, because it won't be me who's opening the door this time.

${user_nick}$
Only "him"...? Is there someone other than Feder?

$Lunaria$
...(She doesn’t speak anymore.)

${user_nick}$
If you're really here to open the Monolith, then you're my enemy.
(You raise your weapon.)

${user_nick}$
(Lunaria quietly raises her hand to touch your weapon... but her hand just passes through it without any harm!)

${user_nick}$
!!!!!

$Lunaria${sound:npc_Lunaria_9426_qu_06.ogg}
No one can hurt me. I'm an outsider, unwelcomed in any period of time. No one can kill me, unless it's someone who suffers the same fate as me.

$Lunaria$
But I can kill you.

${user_nick}$
(Lunaria reaches for your neck... it feels strange, like touching a cold cloud)

$Lunaria$
...you can't stop me. No one can.
Please go back and close your eyes. Don't see anything. That's what he would want. He's too nice, so he wouldn't be happy if he found out that I hurt you.

${user_nick}$
Who... is "he"?

$Lunaria$
If you don't know already... there's no point telling you about him.
...If you still want to stop me… you leave me with no choice.

${user_nick}$
You're always like that… You never explain anything clearly but I won't let you off this time. I will resort to force if you still stay so persistent.

$Lunaria$
(Lunaria shakes her head) You can't stop me, {user_nick}…

${user_nick}$
(Lunaria reaches out to your weapon, but her hand passes through it.)

${user_nick}$
....!!! What's going on? I've never seen such a thing before...

$Lunaria${sound:npc_Lunaria_9426_qu_07.ogg}
You and I don't share the same fate anymore. That means you don't have to suffer anymore. You can't touch me, but I can.

$Lunaria$
I will not let you stop me... even if it's you who I need to fight...

${user_nick}$
Lunaria!

$Lunaria$
(Lunaria vanished.)

${user_nick}$
(No… Do I need to fight her…?)

${user_nick}$
(It must be that Lunaria has a misunderstanding. That's why she's doing this. That's all... I should talk to her when I see her again.)

${user_nick}$
(I have to let Argenta know about this... about Lunaria)

${user_nick}$
…!! She's gone. But that girl is dangerous… Lunaria...

${user_nick}$
I should tell Argenta about this.

${user_nick}$
What happened??

$Elf Elder${sound:npc_ElfElder_9427_qu_02.ogg}
…I'm sorry...
<html>$Quest Completed$</html>

$Elf Elder$
...he's so powerful beyond my imagination!

qstep_change.comment: 대화 종료 시 5스텝 4저널로 변경. 루나리아 - 페더 제거 화면 전환. 페르데레스 생성

journal.title: The One Who Tries To Open The Door 1
journal.contents:
Ask Elf Elder if anyone has intruded into the Monolith.

Anu Arendel (Tree of Life) - Elf Elder
journal.todo_msg: Quest has been added. Meet the Elf Elder.

journal.title: The One Who Tries To Open The Door 2
journal.contents:
Elf Elder has not seen any intruders. Ask Elf King Federeth if he has sensed any intruders.

Anu Arendel (Tree of Life) → Tree of Life (Elf King Federeth)
journal.todo_msg: Visit Elf King Federeth and ask him about the intruder.

journal.title: The One Who Tries To Open The Door 3
journal.contents:
Elf King Federeth is nowhere to be found. Instead, you see Feder and Lunaria. Listen to what they're talking about.

Anu Arendel (Tree of Life) → Tree of Life (Feder and Lunaria)
journal.destination: See what Lunaria has to say
journal.todo_msg: Listen to the conversation between Feder and Lunaria.

journal.title: The One Who Tries To Open The Door 4
journal.contents:
Feder and Lunaria disappeared. Talk to Elf King Federeth.

Anu Arendel (Tree of Life) → Tree of Life (Elf King Federeth)

journal.title: The One Who Tries To Open The Door 5
journal.contents:
According to Elf King Federeth, there seems to be something at the Abyss of Heat.
Go and investigate.

Anu Arendel (Fire Mountain Entrance) → Abyss of Heat (???)

journal.title: The One Who Tries To Open The Door 6
journal.contents:
Lunaria disappeared.
Think about what you should do.

Anu Arendel (Fire Mountain Entrance) → Abyss of Heat (Where Lunaria Was)
journal.todo_msg: Consider what you should do about Lunaria.

journal.title: The One Who Tries To Open The Door 7
journal.contents:
Return to Argenta and tell her about the current situation.

Anu Arendel (Tree of Life) → ???

journal.title: The One Who Tries To Open The Door 8
journal.contents:
Feder has attacked Anu Arendel!
Talk to Elf Elder.

Anu Arendel (Tree of Life) → Elf Elder
